name: Conscript
flavor: A poorly trained civilian pressed into war.

features.name: Minion (6) - Passive
features.desc: The Conscript is defeated when they take any damage. For every 6 damage a PC deals to the Conscript, defeat an additional Minion within range the attack would succeed against.

features.name: Group Attack - Action
features.desc: Spend a Fear to choose a target and spotlight all Conscripts within Close range of them. Those Minions move into Melee range of the target and make one shared attack roll. On a success, they deal 6 physical damage each. Combine this damage.
